actions.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Gosar.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following:    SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to deliver a printed copy of the United States House of Representatives Telephone Directory to the office of any Member of the House of Representatives (including a Delegate or Resident Commissioner to the Congress).
purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 114-611 to prohibit any funds for delivering printed copies of the United States House of Representatives Telephone Directory to the office of any Member of the House of Representatives.
